      • createCronScheduleBuilder

        protected org.quartz.CronScheduleBuilder createCronScheduleBuilder(String cronExpr)
        Allow timezone to be configured on a per-cron basis with [timezoneName] appended to the cron format
        参数:
        cronExpr - the modified cron format
        返回:
        the cron schedule with the timezone applied to it if needed
